SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.student.tmdbts.search_engine.gateway

Class GatewayImpl

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
pt.uc.dei.student.tmdbts.search_engine.gateway.GatewayImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Remote, Gateway
public class GatewayImpl extends UnicastRemoteObject implements Gateway
GatewayImpl class

The GatewayImpl class is responsible for the Gateway implementation. It is responsible for managing the queue of URLs to be indexed, the barrels and the callbacks. It also provides methods to add URLs to the queue, get the next URL from the queue, check if the queue is empty, get the size of the queue, print the queue, search by a query, print the information panel, register a barrel for callbacks, unregister a barrel for callbacks and print a message on the server.

See Also:

  • Field Details

    • queue

      private ConcurrentLinkedDeque<URI> queue
      Queue of URLs to be indexed. ConcurrentLinkedDeque is used to allow multiple threads to access the queue.

    • barrels

      private static HashMap<String,StorageBarrels> barrels
      HashMap of barrels. The key is the barrel name and the value is the StorageBarrels object.

    • clients

      private static HashMap<Integer,Client> clients
      HashMap of clients. The key is the client id and the value is the Client object.
